structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases
Post Conviction Access To Forensic And Scientific Analysis

law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 38 effective May 17, 2012.] The costs of the analysis shall be paid: (1) by the moving party if the moving party does not meet the definition of indigency under section 2 of chapter 211D and has sufficient means to make such payment; (2) if the moving party meets the definition of indigency under said section 2 of said chapter 211D, as an extra fee or cost under sections 27A through 27G, inclusive, of chapter 261; or (3) if a person is indigent, but has the ability to pay a reduced fee as defined under said section 2 of said chapter 211D, by the moving party to the maximum feasible amount possible given the financial resources of the moving party as the court deems equitable.
